info.title: SIEVE
info.description:
This is the OpenAPI specification for the communication to the SIEVE backend via the REST-API. The SIEVE frontend and backend communicate via this API.

**Note**: Better Auth currently does not support customizing the tag names.
Therefore, the 'Default' tag is used for endpoints that are related to user authentication and session management.

tags.name: Default
tags.description: Endpoints for user authentication and session management.

tags.name: Users
tags.description: Endpoints for listing and inspecting users. Accessible only to users with admin roles.

tags.name: Emails
tags.description: Endpoints for submitting and managing uploaded emails. Each uploaded email triggers job creation and processing in the backend.

tags.name: Jobs
tags.description: Endpoints to list or inspect background processing jobs created by the user.

tags.name: Health
tags.description: Endpoint to check the health status of the SIEVE backend service.

jobs.description: IDs of jobs created by the user

emails.description: IDs of emails uploaded by the user

userId.description: User ID who created the job

emailId.description: Email ID associated with this job

body.example:
Dear Sir or Madam,

I would like to request information regarding the availability of the following pieces...

Best regards,
Alice Smith
